vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.20.1;
father of: Sheba (H7652A)
Also named: be.ri (בֵּרִים "Bichrite" H1276)
§ Bichri = "youthful"
n pr m
1) a Benjamite, father of Sheba
adj
2) (BDB) the Bichrites
vocabInfos._es_Definition: padre de Seba; tribu de Benjamín
